user.title: Configure Google Maps Weather
user.description:
Enter your Google Maps API key and location to get weather data.

⚠️ IMPORTANT: 3 calls per update (current + daily + hourly). Free tier allows 1000 calls/month.

data_description.update_interval:
Update frequency (3 calls/update). Options:
• 90 min (~960 calls/month) - Within limit
• 120 min (~720 calls/month) - Recommended ✓
• 150 min (~576 calls/month) - Conservative
• 180 min (~480 calls/month) - Very conservative
• 240 min (~360 calls/month) - Ultra conservative
data_description.hourly_forecast_hours:
Number of hours for hourly forecast:
• 24h (1 day)
• 48h (2 days) - Recommended ✓
• 72h (3 days)
• 96h (4 days)
• 120h (5 days)
• 168h (7 days)
• 240h (10 days) - Maximum

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the API. Check your API key and internet connection.
